title.narrative: PUBLIC FINANCING AND SYSTEMS STRENGTHENING

description.narrative: National and sub-national systems have enhanced capacity to plan and budget to children and adolescents priorities, which contributes to Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, children and adolescents, especially the most vulnerable, have improved access to equitable, integrated and adequately financed basic services and social protection, and contribute to a cohesive, peaceful and resilient Iraqi society.

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

sector.narrative: Contributing to policies reducing child poverty: Poverty reduction strategies, national development plans, engagement with ministries, parliament, international donor and financial organizations, civil society organizations)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Technical assistance - Child poverty, Public Finance and Local Governance

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National and sub-national systems have enhanced capacity to plan and budget to children and adolescents priorities

description.narrative: UNICEF started a new partnership with the Ministries of Finance, Planning, and social ministries to generate evidence on public spending for children and to establish entry points to increase participation in budget formulation and linkages between budgets and national strategies. Work is underway on fiscal space analysis, sector budget briefs, and training module for budget formulation.Significant acceleration was;made in support of an enabling environment for adolescents and youth though the launch of a National Youth Vision 2030 framework, including the establishment of UN inter-agency working group aiming at bolstering advocacy and coordination for young people in Iraq. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2022
